prompts.prompt: Set the presence availability to '{availability}' for {durationHours} hours. If number of hours is not mentioned, just set it for 1 hour.

template.name: set-presence-availability
template.title: Set presence availability
template.description: Sets the availability (e.g., Available, Busy, DoNotDisturb, Away) for a given number of hours.

arguments.name: availability
arguments.description: The desired availability state (e.g., Available, Busy, DoNotDisturb or Away).

arguments.name: durationHours
arguments.description: The duration in hours for which to set the availability.

prompts.prompt: List all channels for the team {teamName}. Show each channel's description and whether it is private or standard.

template.name: list-team-channels
template.title: List team channels
template.description: Lists all channels in a specified Microsoft Teams team, showing descriptions and privacy types.

arguments.name: teamName
arguments.description: The display name of the Microsoft Teams team.

prompts.prompt: Send the following message to the {channelName} channel in the {teamName} team: {message}.

template.name: send-team-channel-message
template.title: Send team channel message
template.description: Sends a message to a specific channel within a specified team.

arguments.name: teamName
arguments.description: The display name of the Microsoft Teams team.

arguments.name: channelName
arguments.description: The display name of the channel within the team.

prompts.prompt: List all Microsoft Teams teams I am a member of, including each team's description and number of members.

template.name: list-joined-teams
template.title: List joined teams
template.description: Lists all Microsoft Teams teams the user has joined, including descriptions and member counts.

prompts.prompt: Search the id of Microsoft Teams with name '{teamName}'. Create a new channel called {channelName} in the {teamName} team. The channel should be {channelType} (Standard, Private or SHared). Optionally, use this description: {description}.

template.name: create-team-channel
template.title: Create team channel
template.description: Creates a new channel in a specified Microsoft Teams team. You can specify the name, type (Standard/Private), and optionally a description.

arguments.name: teamName
arguments.description: The display name of the Microsoft Teams team.

arguments.name: channelName
arguments.description: The name of the new channel.

arguments.name: channelType
arguments.description: The type of channel: Standard or Private or Shared.

arguments.name: description
arguments.description: A description for the new channel.
